How does the study propose to use insigh: By designing nanobodies that target specific protein conformations
By developing vaccines that mimic TRiC interactions
By engineering TRiC to directly bind the spike protein
By using TRiC as a delivery vehicle for antiviral drugs
What is the role of AlphaFold-Multimer i: Predicting the interaction between PDCD5 and TRiC subunits
Simulating the folding cycle of TRiC
Analyzing the substrate-bound state of TRiC
Determining the spatial organization of TRiC
What is the significance of validating c: Ensuring the stability and efficacy of nanobody candidates
Increasing the speed of nanobody production
Reducing the cost of nanobody development
Enhancing the immune response to the spike protein
